alert.note: Alert for Pennington (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 8:00AM CDT until April 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Highlanding near Goodridge affecting Pennington County. .With current rainfall and snow melt ongoing, minor then moderate flood stage will be rapidly approached within the next 24 hours. Crest will be subject to change as additional forecast precipitation is accounted for within the river forecasts. Regardless, current forecasts indicate crest around mid to late day Sunday, then gradually falling moving into next week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Red Lake River at Highlanding near Goodridge. * WHEN...From this morning to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, MAJOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
